name: UnitedHealth Group Incorporated
description: UnitedHealth Group Incorporated is a diversified health and well-being company based in the United States, dedicated to improving health outcomes and enhancing the healthcare experience. Founded in 1977, UnitedHealth Group operates through two primary divisions: UnitedHealthcare, which provides health care coverage and benefits services to individuals and employers, and Optum, which offers information and technology-enabled health services. The company serves a wide range of customers, including individuals, businesses, and government entities, making it one of the largest health insurers in the world. UnitedHealth Group is committed to leveraging technology and data analytics to improve access to healthcare, streamline operations, and enhance patient care through innovative solutions. The company focuses on value-based care, aiming to lower healthcare costs while improving patient health outcomes. With a mission to help people live healthier lives and to help make the health system work better for everyone, UnitedHealth Group is at the forefront of transforming the healthcare landscape, investing in digital health initiatives, and advocating for policy changes that support health equity and access.

seo.meta_title: UnitedHealth Group | Health and Well-Being Solutions
seo.meta_description: Explore UnitedHealth Group, a leader in healthcare and well-being solutions, committed to transforming the health system and improving health outcomes for all.

faq.question: What does UnitedHealth Group do?
faq.answer: UnitedHealth Group provides health care coverage and health services through its UnitedHealthcare and Optum divisions.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of UnitedHealth Group?
faq.answer: Andrew Witty is the CEO of UnitedHealth Group.

faq.question: Where is UnitedHealth Group headquartered?
faq.answer: UnitedHealth Group is headquartered in Minnetonka, Minnesota, USA.

faq.question: What are the main divisions of UnitedHealth Group?
faq.answer: The main divisions of UnitedHealth Group are UnitedHealthcare and Optum.
